<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skitter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2151) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 16; [Fleet](/Feats.aspx?ID=784)

</column>

---

You can scoot swiftly across the ground. You can [Crawl](/Actions.aspx?ID=76) up to half your Speed.
name: Skitter
